code: import{SWITCH_THEME,TOGGLE_FORM,CURRENT_ID}from'../constants/actionTypes';export var switchTheme=function switchTheme(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SWITCH_THEME});};};export var toggleFormShow=function toggleFormShow(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:TOGGLE_FORM});};};export var handleCurrentId=function handleCurrentId(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:CURRENT_ID,payload:id!==null?id:null});};};
